answers.answer: Aw! So sorry you are having a rough time and sorry for your losses too. I have had a miscarriage and I know its rough. I'm also having a girl after 2 boys. I've been super sick this pregnancy and had all kinds of pain that I didn't have with either of my boys. Pelvic pain, back pain, hip pain. I'm 32 weeks now. You are almost there! Hang in there. She'll be worth it. :)

My first was actually worst than this one. My daughter I stayed sick the entire time. The smell of water set me running to the bathroom. This time I havent been sick at all but once but my legs have swelled a lot. Hopefully you don't have much longer. It sounds like you need to be on bed rest.

Yes. Being induced for gestational hypertension Tuesday. This is my 6th child. The others were a breeze. But as most moms who know will tell you, and like they told me, every pregnancy is different. I am no doctor, but because of the protein and swelling they will probably watch for preeclampsia. In which case they could probably induce. At least thats what they are doing to me. Dont worry. Everything will he fine!

My pregnancy with my daughter was horrendous, I was so sick I was admitted to hospital 3 times for dehydration. I then had about 5 weeks off being sick, then I got pre-eclampsia. I was in and out of hospital like a yoyo and was finally admitted permanently a month before her due date and was induced at 37 weeks.I'm currently 36 weeks pregnant with our son. I was a little sick (the normal amount), I actually had people tell me I was glowing during my 2nd trimester and now my main issue is reflux (which iz nothing compared to my daughter) i am still comfortable and although my blood pressure is a tad high it seems to be stable (It's being checked twice a week).It's amazing how different each pregnancy can be. My daughter put me off having another for 3 years where as this pregnancy I'm really going to miss x
I have two daughters and a little  boy due December 21 and This pregnancy I have the most pain back pain vaginal pain and a lot of discharge

question: I'm 35 weeks pregnant with baby #3 had two healthy boys now expecting a girl,having such a terrible time carrying my little miracle 'had 5 miscarriages in 4years' im measuring 2weeks ahead of time and experiencing pelvis pain from 20week and recently been told have protein in my water and now swelling to feet and ankles. I know every pregnancy is different but has anyone else been through such a drastic change in their pregnancies. If similar did you have the child early??
title: Awful pregnancy.
